name: php-simple-mvc
description: Install few Transpiler and Uglify tools that I need in my php-mvc project.

scripts.uglifyjs: bash -c 'for f in assets/js/dist/*.js; do fn=${f##*/}; fn=${fn%.*}; uglifyjs $f --compress --mangle -o assets/js/dist/${fn}.min.js; done #--toplevel --source-map'
scripts.lessc: bash -c 'for f in assets/css/src/*.less; do fn=${f##*/}; fn=${fn%.*}; lessc --strict-imports $f --clean-css="--s1 --advanced --compatibility=ie8" assets/css/dist/${fn}.min.css; done'
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run babel && npm run uglifyjs && npm run lessc

author: Spas Z. Spasov
